description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment (S96a) to planning permission ref: 241738FUL dated 23/04/2025 for: Part-retrospective change of use from the existing car showroom and MOT garage into a place of worship (Class F1), community facilities and associated outdoor advertisement. Partially retrospective application for physical works to facades of buildings, and installation of plant, and proposed external landscaping alterations. Amendments seek changes to existing and proposed plans and elevations for both Annex 1 and 2 to reflect minor amendment and to show the position of all existing rooflights and removal of hatching over door on elevation E
site_name: Site Of Monorep Car Dealers Poplar AvenueSouthallUB2 4PN
